title: Fenrir, the One Who Would Shake the Earth
description: A significantly reimagined story of Temujin, who the world will soon come to know as Genghis Khan, from his early beginning in the steppe and his chance meeting with a mysterious woman who claims to be the Fenrir, the One Who Would Shake the Earth, to his ultimate destiny as the ruler of all.
author: Akamatsu Chuugaku

1.title: The One Who Would Shake the Earth, part 1

2.title: The One Who Would Shake the Earth, part 2
